content: please note this is a pay-what-you-want-pattern you can pay full price or use the code **royalicing50** for paying only 50% or even **royalicing0** for getting it for free thank you so much for supporting my designing journey and have fun knitting up this beautiful headband ❤️ about the royal icing headband is worked flat in brioche stitch with i-cord edging and is sewn together with a twist it is flexible in length and can be made for all head circumferences you can sew beads onto the headband optionally gauge 20 sts in brioche pattern = 10 cm / 4 in with 3 5 mm us size 4 needles the row gauge is not that important as the length of the headband is flexible materials needed - ca 35 g of merino 120 superwash 50g = 120 m/131 yards by langyarns or any other yarn with which you can meet gauge and some extra yarn for your gauge swatch - 3 5 mm us size 4 needles - measuring tape - scissors - darning needle - optionally beads i used some with 3 mm 6 mm and 8 mm diameter a thin needle and yarn for sewing on the beads
